entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY AND BREEZY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 80
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
